messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hi.  I am in need of some "unschooling" support :)
messages.msgSnippet: ... ages ... have ... and ... they ... on ... I have ... *normal* ... email ... She s got a sense of humour.  She ll last here.   Welcome Kris.  Like
messages.messageBody:
> Hi. My name is Kris and I live just outside of Key West. I have 2 boys
ages
> 6 & 8. Apparently, I have been unschooling them their whole lives. I
have
> purchased about a kajillion dollars worth of curriculum over the years,
and
> yet, I can't bring myself to make my boys sit still and learn what I feel
they
> should know. So... we continue to let life be our guide. I am coming up
on
> evaluation time for my older son... my youngest is still not registered.
I have
> *some* work to show, but not a whole lot. I really just need to feel
*normal*
> about how we do things around here, so that is why I have joined your
email
> list. Just thought I'd introduce myself... okay... now back to who is and
> isn't "do-able" : ) ~Kris

She's got a sense of humour. She'll last here. <g>

Welcome Kris. Like someone else said, the Florida people will likely join
in soon and get you connected with local resources.

Smart boys you have, refusing to do curriculum. %^ )
Tia in B.C.

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
